div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2386 Castelet de Fontvielle, 5 km. NE of Arles, 1969-1970 Burial: mid 1st cent. B.C. Contents: 58 AR, 1 AE Massalia: 48 ob. and smaller fr. (some halved) 1 AE Imitations (Gallic, Gallo-Roman etc.): 10 AR Disposition: private coll., Arles Rolland, RN 1970, pp. 111-5, illus.
